name: DeepBlue
description:
DeepBlue is a Game, i developed accidentally. Accidentally? How is it possible, to make a game by an accident? Well, i wrote the Brick breaker game, but it wasn't so good, because the ball moved in 45 deegre angle, and it wasn't possible to break all bricks. So i changed a bit the code .... and there we go! A new type of game created by an accident But, to make this look and work as it does now, took me about a month.

Thanks to all who played, or donated this game. It is a big motivation for me, to make new updates, and other games. It is my first game ever made that actually works.
